title: Friends and well-wishers left flowers and messages of support in front of the secondary school in the eastern town of Nogent
text: Friends and well-wishers left flowers and messages of support in front of the secondary school in the eastern town of Nogent FRANCOIS NASCIMBENI Jun 12, 2025 Jun 12, 2025 Updated 14 mins ago 0 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp LinkedIn SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Friends and well-wishers left flowers and messages of support in front of the secondary school in the eastern town of Nogent FRANCOIS NASCIMBENI Tags Partners/afp As featured on +2 France school stabbing suspect said wanted to kill any campus monitor A 14-year-old French school pupil detained for stabbing to death a teaching assistant had wanted to attack "any" adult monitor after being reprimanded for kissing his girlfriend, a prosecutor said Wednesday.
